channel.title: Barrage not freezing
channel.description: i got barrage but it doesnt freeze people.. they can still move :S ... how do i change this ?

item.title: Barrage not freezing
item.dc:creator: @Halo_Pk Halo_Pk
item.description:
@Halo_Pk wrote:

to make ice barrage freeze

step1:search for

if(magicID == 12891)

you should see

if(magicID == 12891) // ice barrage (lvl 94 spell) { if(playerLevel[6] >= -124 && playerLevel[3] >= 1) { if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 40)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(4278, 40)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(554, 60)==false)) { sendMessage("You do not have enough runes to cast this spell."); } else if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 40)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(4278, 40)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(554, 60)==true)) { deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 40); deleteItem(4278, getItemSlot(4278), 40); deleteItem(554, getItemSlot(554), 60); startAnimation(1979); attackNPCSWithin(369, 39, 0); //hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(67); server.npcHandler.PoisonNPC(npcIndex); inCombat(); entangle(); PkingDelay = 15; sendMessage("You poison and freeze the enemy!"); //stillgfx(369, EnemyY2, EnemyX2); stillgfx(20, EnemyY2, EnemyX2); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; } } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 124) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 125 to cast this spell."); } }

just copy paste that over it

note if its not pimpscape look at your gfx and change it to correct names

and if u dont have this void ill post it for ya
entangle();

Read full topic
